climate-change.title: Climate Change
climate-change.description: The government should increase environmental regulations to prevent climate change.

more-info.text: Changes in average weather conditions that persist over multiple decades or longer.
human activity (releasing carbon into the atmosphere) currently contributing to global warming.

paris-climate-agreement.title: The Paris Climate Agreement
paris-climate-agreement.description: The U.S. should withdraw from the Paris Climate Agreement.

more-info.text: Changes in average weather conditions that persist over multiple decades or longer.
human activity (releasing carbon into the atmosphere) currently contributing to global warming.

alternative-energy.title: Alternative Energy
alternative-energy.description: The government should give tax credits and subsidies to the green power industry?

more-info.text: Green energy comes from natural sources such as sunlight, wind, rain, tides, plants, algae and geothermal heat. These energy resources are renewable, meaning they're naturally replenished.
A sum of money granted by the government or a public body to assist an industry or business so that the price of a commodity or service may remain low or competitive.

fracking.title: Fracking
fracking.description: Using hydraulic fracking to extract oil and natural gas resources.

more-info.text: the process of injecting liquid at high pressure into subterranean rocks, boreholes, etc. so as to force open existing fissures and extract oil or gas.

plastic-product-ban.title: Plastic Product Ban
plastic-product-ban.description: Disposable products (such as plastic cups, plates, and cutlery) that contain less than 50% of biodegradable material should be banned.

more-info.text: the process of injecting liquid at high pressure into subterranean rocks, boreholes, etc. so as to force open existing fissures and extract oil or gas.

border-wall.title: Border Wall
border-wall.description: The U.S. should build a wall along the southern border.

immigration.title: Immigration
immigration.description: Children of illegal immigrants should be granted legal citizenship.

immigration-ban.title: Immigration Ban
immigration-ban.description: There should be a temporary ban on all immigration to the U.S..

deporting-criminal-immigrants.title: Criminal Immigrant Deportation
deporting-criminal-immigrants.description: Immigrants should be deported if they commit a serious crime.

sanctuary-cities.title: Sanctuary Cities
sanctuary-cities.description: Sanctuary Cities should recieve federal funding.

more-info.text: Sanctuary city refers to municipal jurisdictions, that limit their cooperation with the national government's effort to enforce immigration law.

illegal-immigrant-detainment.title: Illegal Immigrant Detainment
illegal-immigrant-detainment.description: Local law enforcement should be allowed to detain illegal immigrants for minor crimes and transfer them to federal immigration authorities.

more-info.text: the process of injecting liquid at high pressure into subterranean rocks, boreholes, etc. so as to force open existing fissures and extract oil or gas.

border-security.title: Border Security
border-security.description: The U.S. increase restrictions on its current border security policy.

more-info.text: the process of injecting liquid at high pressure into subterranean rocks, boreholes, etc. so as to force open existing fissures and extract oil or gas.

gun-control.title: Gun Control
gun-control.description: There should be more restrictions of the process of purchasing a gun.

gerrymandering.title: Gerrymandering
gerrymandering.description: The redrawing of Congressional districts should be controlled by an independent, non-partisan commission.

more-info.text: Currently, the redistricting of congressional boundaries is controlled by state legislature every ten years. Gerrymandering is the redrawing of districts with the intent of benefiting a political party. It is most often implemented by state political parties with the intent of marginalizing districts of voters who represent the minority party. To gain extra seats, the incumbent party will redraw voting districts so that voters of the minority party will be grouped into smaller districts with less seats.

Affirmative action is a policy that encourages the increased representation of members of a minority group. In the U.S. these policies are often enacted by employers and educational institutions in education or employment.

net-neutrality.title: Drug policy
net-neutrality.description: Internet service providers be allowed to speed up access to popular websites (that pay higher rates) at the expense of slowing down access to less popular websites (that pay lower rates).

more-info.text: Net Neutrality is the basic principle that prohibits internet service providers like AT&T, Comcast and Verizon from speeding up, slowing down or blocking any content, applications or websites you want to use.

equal-pay.title: Equal Pay
equal-pay.description: Employers should be required to pay men and women the same salary for the same job.

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: The U.S. should raise taxes on the rich.

corporate-tax.title: Corporate Tax
corporate-tax.description: The U.S. should raise the tax rate for corporations.

government-spending.title: Government Spending
government-spending.description: The government should make cuts to public spending in order to reduce the national debt.

more-info.text: Money expended by a government to pay for defense, development projects, education, health, infrastructure, law and order maintenance, etc. Public spending is supported by taxation.

universal-basic-income.title: Universal Basic Income
universal-basic-income.description: The U.S. should implement a universal basic income

more-info.text: A periodic cash payment delivered to all on an individual basis without means test or work requirement.

welfare.title: Welfare
welfare.description: There should be more restrictions on current welfare benefits.

more-info.text: Welfare benefits come with a pre-decided share for everyone. Not everybody is eligible under distinct categories which restricts the amount of people given benefits.

capital-gains-tax.title: Capital Gains Tax
capital-gains-tax.description: The government should increase the tax rate on profits earned from the sale of stocks, bonds, and real estate.

more-info.text: A capital gains tax is a tax on the profit realized on the sale of a non-inventory asset that was greater than the amount realized on the sale. The most common capital gains are realized from the sale of stocks, bonds, precious metals, and property.

Federal government funds paid to U.S. agribusinesses. They help reduce the risk farmers endure from the weather, commodities brokers, and disruptions in demand. The government currently subsidizes five of them (corn, soybeans, wheat, cotton, and rice).

electorial-college.title: Electorial College
electorial-college.description: The Electorial College should be abolished.

more-info.text: The Electoral College consists of 538 electors. A majority of 270 electoral votes is required to elect the President. Your state's entitled allotment of electors equals the number of members in its Congressional delegation: one for each member in the House of Representatives plus two for your Senators.

campaign-finance.title: Campaign Finance
campaign-finance.description: There should be a limit to the amount of money a candidate can receive from a donor.

student-loans.title: Student Loans
student-loans.description: The taxes on the rich should be increased to reduce the interest rate of student loans.

military-spending.title: Military Spending
military-spending.description: The government should increase military spending.

foreign-aid.title: Foreign Aid
foreign-aid.description: The U.S. should increase foreign aid spending.

united-nations.title: United Nations
united-nations.description: The U.S. should remain in the United Nations.

more-info.text: The United Nations is an intergovernmental organization tasked with maintaining international peace and security, developing friendly relations among nations, achieving international co-operation, and being a centre for harmonizing the actions of nations.
Anti-abortion movements, also referred to as pro-life movements, are involved in the abortion debate advocating against the practice of abortion and its legality.
Abortion-rights movements, also referred to as pro-choice movements, advocate for legal access to induced abortion services.

gay-marriage.title: Gay Marriage
gay-marriage.description: Same sex marriage should be legal.

single-payer-healthcare.title: Single-Payer Healthcare
single-payer-healthcare.description: A type of universal healthcare financed by taxes that covers the costs of essential healthcare for all residents, with costs covered by a single public system

more-info.text: Pays for all covered healthcare-related services by a single government or government-related source.
Establishes one set of rules for services offered, reimbursement rates, drug prices, and minimum standards for required services.

Single payer health insurance also referred to as 'Medicare for all' for the USA is the concept of a health insurance system in which all residents of the U.S. would be covered for all medically necessary services.

pre-existing-conditions.title: Pre-Exising Conditions
pre-existing-conditions.description: A health problem you had before the date that your new health coverage starts. Health insurers should be allowed to deny coverage to individuals who have a pre-existing condition?

drug-price-regulation.title: Drug Price Regulation
drug-price-regulation.description: The government should regulate the prices of life-saving drugs.

mental-health.title: Mental Health
mental-health.description: The government should increase funding for mental health research and treatment.

medicaid.title: Medicaid
medicaid.description: The federal government increase funding of health care for low income individuals.

medicare-drug-prices.title: Medicare Drug Prices
medicare-drug-prices.description: The federal government be allowed to negotiate drug prices for Medicare.

medicaid-work-requirement.title: Medicaid Work Requirement
medicaid-work-requirement.description: People should be required to work in order to receive Medicaid.

veteran-asistance-privatization.title: Veteran Asistace Privatization
veteran-asistance-privatization.description: There should be more privatization of veterans' healthcare

safe-haven.title: Safe Haven
safe-haven.description: Cities should open drug ‚Äúsafe havens‚Äù where people who are addicted to illegal drugs can use them under the supervision of medical professionals
